thread.title: karen leathers

author: karen leathers
title: karen leathers
text:
Are new to Trusted Housesitters and found the whole experience very positive and uplifiting that there are so many lovely people out there wanting to travel and willing to look after our pets and homes with such care and respect.
It seems the perfect combination for home / pet owners to go away with peace of mind, whilst allowing travellers to see different parts of the world while staying in their homes and looking after their pets.
We look forward to meeting many more house sitters and hope they enjoy staying in a new area, home and enjoy the experience.
